description: This file defines a data service module for interacting with a Supabase backend, including user authentication, profile management, and request handling functions. It includes internal utility functions for normalizing data and handling errors, and exposes a public API for registration, login, request creation, and subscription to auth changes.

methods.name: supaUserToAppUser
methods.description: Converts a Supabase auth user object into a minimal app user object with role and approval status, attempting to read additional profile info.

methods.name: normalizeVehicle
methods.description: Normalizes vehicle data from database row or input object to a standard {make, model} format.

methods.name: normalizeContact
methods.description: Normalizes contact data from database row or input object to a standard {name, phone} format.

methods.name: forceUserCreateStatusOpen
methods.description: Ensures request payload has status set to 'open' and strips any caller-provided status.

methods.name: normalizeSupabaseAuthError
methods.description: Converts various Supabase error messages into user-friendly strings.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: loginWithGoogle
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login with Google via Supabase.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Signs out the current user via Supabase.

methods.name: getUserFromSession
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user based on session cache.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user directly from Supabase.

methods.name: subscribeToAuthChanges
methods.description: Subscribes to auth state changes, providing immediate minimal user info and background enrichment.

methods.name: getProfile
methods.description: Fetches user profile data from 'public.profiles' table.

methods.name: listRequests
methods.description: Lists requests, optionally filtered by user ID, normalizing data for UI.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Fetches a specific request by ID, normalizing data for UI.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new request for the logged-in user, enforcing specific payload shape and default status.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if Supabase environment variables are configured (always returns true here).
